column5: Greetings, I am already familiar with Bobby's in Vermillion Bay. They are my last opportunity to pick up live bait before I head to the fishing lodge. Unfortunately, Bobby's has left me disappointed more than once. Thus, I now try to get my live bait before I reach the end of the line so to speak. Rainy Lake Sports in Fort Frances normally has what I want. I was wondering if there are shops with live bait in Dryden, Ontario. I've never heard of any being mentioned, but assume there must be at least one good bait shop. Any recommendations for shops with live bait in Dryden? Kindest regards.....
http://www.qsltackle.ca/Try this? I don't know anything about it,...I jus found it surfing the net. Good luck !!
Here's a list to check out. http://www.canpages.ca/list.jsp?ct=P...&na=bait+Shops
Holy smokes,.....I guess I didn't surf long enough !!!!!

Depending on where your going.but up hwy #105 on the camp robinson rd there is clarkes northern lights resort.they are also the biggest bait desler in the area supplying most camps and bait shops (not bobbys) they would be your best bet if your heading that way.
Hello Prov1800, Thanks for the recommendation. Do you know if Clarkes carries nightcrawlers and leeches? If so, I will give them a call. I'm not too worried about minnows. Many thanks....
BTF .Here is the ph # to Clarks Northern Lights resort ..(807) 529-6561
